tool_description: Monitors ongoing and completed cleanup operations, tracks performance metrics, and provides real-time status updates and alerts.

execution_ids.description: Specific execution IDs to monitor, or empty for all active executions

include_completed.description: Include completed executions in monitoring results

error_messages: Execution ID not found: One or more specified execution_ids do not exist.
Monitoring limit exceeded: Maximum 50 execution IDs can be monitored simultaneously.
usage: Monitor cleanup operations by providing execution_ids array, or leave empty to monitor all active operations. Set include_completed=true to see historical execution data.

active_executions.description: Status of active executions in format: execution_id|progress_percent|estimated_remaining

completed_executions.description: Summary of completed executions in format: execution_id|status|completion_time|space_freed

performance_metrics.description: Performance statistics including throughput and error rates

monitoring_summary.description: Overall monitoring summary with system health and recommendations
